description:
This advanced seminar will focus on classic and recent research in the area
of social cognition, loosely defined as the study of cognitive processes in
social judgment and behaviour. The overarching goal of this course is to
provide students with an in-depth, advanced review of research and theory
in social cognition.
title: Advanced Seminar in Social Cognition
prerequisite:
YSS2201 Understanding Behaviour and Cognition
YSS2216 Statistics and Research Methods for Psychology
Both pre-requisite courses are necessary.
